pr_title: Added version checking for new blob and file APIs

timeline.bodyText: Mind adding an explanation of the class here
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Let's make this a static final at the class level, no need to instantiate this each time the policy processes.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: This should throw an IllegalStateException as we don't expect to get here, also if version is null a NPE would be thrown by the conditional clauses in this method.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Should check that BlobServiceVersion.getVersion equals version.
BlobServiceVersion.V2019_02-02.getVersions().equals(version)
This is better since the enum has to be set but version may not be set (though I think it always will be).
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Did something pull this dependency in?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Just an artefact of me trying something then undoing it
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.bodyText:
Similar comments in this file as the Blobs one.

Make constant strings static final at the class level.
Reverse the version comparison to use the enum as the .equals caller since it is known to be set.
Change the NullPointerException to an IllegalStateException.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Should a helper method be added into StorageImplUtils that validates that the request doesn't contain a given query parameter?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Added version checking for new blob and file APIs
Added version checking for new blob and file APIs
